1109.name: Colmonoy 4
1109.Applications: Colmonoy® 4 offers outstanding metallurgical and physical properties making them ideally suited to solving wear mechanisms such as abrasion, erosion, corrosion and high-temperatures encountered in service.
1109.Suitable_For: Aircraft gas turbines, steam turbine powerplants, turbochargers and valves in reciprocating engines, prosthetic devices, heat treating equipment, pollution control equipment, coal gasification and liquefaction systems, and components in pulp and paper mills.
